page.title: 08Mr.Judge-The Honey Man
page.content: 22 years ago Mr.Judge kept hives of bees in his garden.Now he employs 13 people in his factory. Most of the honey is now imported from Australia,Mexico and many other countries.The honey is warmed and mixed in vats to produce clear or set honey.It is poured into jars,lids put on and labelled by machine.The jars are then packed in dozens,crated and stored ready for delivery to shops and supermarkets.1008 dozen jars are processed every day.The honey is sent all over the country and there are some export orders.Mr.Judge now bottles 25 different brands of honey. Because of healthier eating habits the demand for honey is increasing all the time and Mr.Judge has plans for extending his factory and improving quality control of his product.His two sons are now employed in the business.
